solution_line_template: There are {multiplier_yellow_red} * {red_chairs} red chairs = <<{multiplier_yellow_red}*{red_chairs}={yellow_chairs}>>{yellow_chairs} yellow chairs.
There are {yellow_chairs} yellow chairs - {fewer_blue_than_yellow} = <<{yellow_chairs}-{fewer_blue_than_yellow}={blue_chairs}>>{blue_chairs} blue chairs.
Total in the morning there were {red_chairs} red + {yellow_chairs} yellow + {blue_chairs} blue = <<{red_chairs}+{yellow_chairs}+{blue_chairs}={total_chairs_morning}>>{total_chairs_morning} chairs.
After Lisa removed chairs there were {total_chairs_morning} - {lisa_borrows} chairs = <<{total_chairs_morning}-{lisa_borrows}={chairs_remaining}>>{chairs_remaining} chairs remaining.
